solution_line_template: Running the length of a football field {field_length} meters in {field_time} hours is a speed of {field_length}/{field_time}=<<{field_length}/{field_time}={speed_meters_per_hour}>>{speed_meters_per_hour} meters per hour.

At the same speed, Amanda will run the length of a {track_length}-meter track in {track_length}/{speed_meters_per_hour} = <<{track_length}/{speed_meters_per_hour}={time_for_track_hours}>>{time_for_track_hours} hours
